resources.string: Think of this as your diary..
We are glad to know that you are happy :)
It is OK to be sad…
Love is what we all need.
don\'t let anger make your decisions!
Some people say that writing about feelings makes us feel better … Shall we try?
Happiness is always contagious! Save your best moments!
Sadness is sometimes a great friend, we can learn a lot from it…Why are you blue today?
Fear gives us the possibility to remember that we are courageous …What\'s going on?
Never forget, value current things, they are the best! What do you value today?
Anger is momentary..I guarantee you, it is NEVER worth it …what is bothering you?
